Naik 8,51 Persen, UMP Sulawesi Selatan Rp 3,1 Juta di Tahun 2020
01 Nov 2019, 05:16 by Didit Hariyadi (Kontributor), Ali Akhmad Noor Hidayat
TEMPO.CO, Makassar - Gubernur Sulawesi Selatan, Nurdin Abdullah mengumumkan Upah Minimum Provinsi (UMP) tahun 2020 sebesar Rp3.103.800.
Kenaikannya sebesar 8,51 persen, dari UMP tahun 2019 sebesar Rp2.860.382.
"Jadi naik Rp243.418 atau 8,51 persen," kata Nurdin Abdullah pada Jumat 1 November 2019.
Menurutnya kenaikan UMP sesuai formulasi perhitungan upah Peraturan Pemerintah Nomor 78 Tahun 2015 tentang Pengupahan. Dengan berdasarkan pada data tingkat inflasi nasional dan pertumbuhan ekonomi nasional tahun 2019 .
Apalagi pemerintah provinsi juga menindaklanjuti surat edaran yang dikeluarkan oleh Kementerian Ketenagakerjaan (Kemenaker).
Dia menyampaikan data tingkat inflasi dan pertumbuhan domestik bruto tingkat inflasi nasional sebesar 3,32 persen dan pertumbuhan ekonomi nasional 5,19 persen tahun 2019. "UMP ini mulai berlaku pada 1 Januari 2020," ucap Nurdin.
Oleh sebab itu Nurdin meminta kepada seluruh pengusaha agar menaati aturan dan keputusan dari pemerintah tentang kenaikan UMP.
Dia berharap kenaikan UMP ini bisa meningkatkan produktivitas dan kesejahteraan tenaga kerja.
text:
Up 8.51 Percent, South Sulawesi UMP Rp 3.1 Million in 2020
01 Nov 2019, 05:16 by Didit Hariyadi (Contributor), Ali Akhmad Noor Hidayat
TEMPO.CO, Makassar - The Governor of South Sulawesi, Nurdin Abdullah announced the 2020 Provincial Minimum Wage (UMP) of Rp3,103,800.
The increase is 8.51 percent, from the 2019 UMP of Rp2,860,382.
"So it increased by Rp243,418 or 8.51 percent," Nurdin Abdullah said on Friday 1 November 2019.
According to him, the increase in the UMP is in accordance with the formulation of the calculation of Government Regulation Number 78 Year 2015 concerning Wages. Based on data from the national inflation rate and national economic growth in 2019.
Moreover, the provincial government is also following up on a circular issued by the Ministry of Manpower (Kemenaker).
He delivered data on the rate of inflation and gross domestic growth of the national inflation rate of 3.32 percent and national economic growth of 5.19 percent in 2019. "This UMP came into force on January 1, 2020," Nurdin said.
Therefore Nurdin asked all entrepreneurs to obey the rules and decisions of the government regarding the increase in the UMP.
He hopes that the increase in the UMP can improve labor productivity and welfare.
